summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 37860 entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block twenty-nine (29), David S. Maynard's Plat and Supplemental Plat of David S. Maynard's Plat, being the alley extending from Main Street to Washington Street, between Fourth Avenue South and Fifth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle; by paving the same with brick blocks; by filling the construction of concrete retaining walls; the construction and reconstruction of necessary sewers; all in accordance with Resolution No. 5626 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved October 31st, 1917.
